snippet: A former friend of convicted murderer and ex-NFL star Aaron Hernandez will identify him as the man who fatally shot two Cape Verdean nationals after a dispute at a Boston nightclub in July 2012, Massachusetts prosecutors said on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: A former friend of convicted murderer and ex-NFL star Aaron Hernandez will identify him as the man who fatally shot two Cape Verdean nationals after a dispute at a Boston nightclub in July 2012, Massachusetts prosecutors said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Friend to Name Ex-NFL Star Hernandez as Gunman in Double Murder: Prosecutor
headline.print_headline: Friend to Name Ex-NFL Star Hernandez as Gunman in Double Murder: Prosecutor
